scm-pathwp-plugin.subtitle: Path Permissions
scm-pathwp-plugin.enableHelpText: If enabled, nobody can write to the repository except when permitted by the specified rules.

form.pathHelpText: Enter an exact path or a pattern. To protect a complete folder use a star at the end of the path (e.g.: trunk/*).
form.branchHelpText: Enter an exact branch name or a pattern. To protect a set of branches use a star at the end of the branch (e.g.: "bugfix/*") or only the star for all branches (e.g.: "*").
form.branchScopeHelpText: Scope which branches will be affected.

table.name: User or Group
table.nameHelpText: Manage permissions for a specific user or group.

confirmDeleteAlert.title: Delete Path Permission
confirmDeleteAlert.message: Do you really want to delete the Path Permission?

scm-pathwp-plugin.obstacle: You do not have permissions to modify the path.

*.description: May modify repository specific path permissions
